description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file to a suspicious target folder
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File Download Via Bitsadmin To A Suspicious Target Folder
query: (((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\:\\\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss].*/ OR /.*\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\\\.*/ OR /.*%[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]%.*/ OR /.*%[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]%.*/))
